product.categories_flat: Beauty > Bath & Body > Cleansers > Solid Soap Bars
product.description: With Cinthol Lime Bathing Soap, every bath is a fresh start. Indulge in the goodness of lime with this bathing soap. Its enhanced lemony fragrance revitalizes your senses to give you a fantastic bathing experience. Cinthol Lime Bath Soap has a great citrus scent that lingers throughout the day and leaves your skin feeling fresh and rejuvenated for the entire day. With Cinthol Lime Soap, being Alive is Awesome. Explore the wide range of refreshing Cinthol soaps, available in 4 other variants, namely Confidence+, Cool, Deo and Original. About the Brand: Cinthol is more than just a personal care brand. It’s a philosophy, best summarized in the three words alive is awesome. It’s about giving people incredible experiences that make living worthwhile and every Cinthol product is one such experience in itself. Though Cinthol is a brand with a legacy, it has continued to reinvent itself with the changing times. In the last two decades, the market dynamics have shifted with it, Cinthol too has upgraded its soap formulation, product mix and packaging design to suit the needs of the new generation consumers. It has introduced a completely new range of soaps, talc's, deos and shower gels, in novel variants with striking, colourful packaging. It’s a brand that today’s youth can relate to, one that’s inspiring, courageous and simply awesome.
feature_bullets: Contains: 9 units of Cinthol Lime Bath Soap (100g each)
HIGH QUALITY: High TFM (Grade 1 soap) that keeps your skin healthy and glowing
LIME FRESHNESS: Intense cooling lime that revitalizes your senses for a fantastic bathing experience
LASTING DEO FRAGRANCE: Long-lasting refreshing fragrance that keeps you fresh and confident all day
SUITABLE FOR: All skin types and all age groups; Ideal for both Men & Women
Also available in 4 other variants: Confidence+, Cool, Deo and Original
product.feature_bullets_flat: Also available in 4 other variants: Confidence+, Cool, Deo and Original. SUITABLE FOR: All skin types and all age groups; Ideal for both Men & Women. top_reviews.title: Pack delivered with open seal.
top_reviews.body: The pack delivered with open seal. Brading/wrapper don't appear to be usual. Genuineness of quality can be told only after use. A bit suspicious.Read more

The pack delivered with open seal. Brading/wrapper don't appear to be usual. Genuineness of quality can be told only after use. A bit suspicious.

top_reviews.title: Excellent Soap at this price range.
top_reviews.body: In product detailed images,Soap cover is different from the image,look at the product image and upload image.Old cinthol soap was little better than this cinthol soap. It's scent is also less than old but all in all this soap is good at this price range.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
In product detailed images,Soap cover is different from the image,look at the product image and upload image.Old cinthol soap was little better than this cinthol soap. It's scent is also less than old but all in all this soap is good at this price range.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Feeling of freshness.
top_reviews.body: Likes: 1) Feeling of freshness. 2) Scent after the bath lasts for hours. 3) Very good value for money. Dislike: Leaves a dry skin after bath. If moisturizer it's very good.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Likes: 1) Feeling of freshness.
2) Scent after the bath lasts for hours.
3) Very good value for money.
Dislike: Leaves a dry skin after bath. If moisturizer it's very good.
Read more

top_reviews.title: The package was open,the seal was broken.
top_reviews.body: The package was open,the seal was broken n soap pakaging is also different from market variant of same size,looks like someone played mischief by changing the content within the box,the scent is totally absent in the soaps and it's nowhere looking like a cinthol soap,very bad quality,seems like a dishwash bar with no smell at all....Read more

top_reviews.title: Seal Broken - Doesn't look genuine
top_reviews.body: The seal was broken to begin with and the seal clearly mentions to NOT purchase if seal is broken. I would not recommend buying this as the soap package also looks repackaged.Read more

top_reviews.title: So fresh. Love it.
top_reviews.body: This product I keep ordering again and again. So fresh. At an amazing price. Just one thing I do wish they would improve is that it leaves the skin slightly dry.Read more
